name: Forgotten World (itch) (Mathieu Derrit, Antoine MAGNIN, Traazior)
name_original: Forgotten World (itch) (Mathieu Derrit, Antoine MAGNIN, Traazior)
description:
Forgotten World (itch) (Mathieu Derrit, Antoine MAGNIN, Traazior) is an action game developed by Mathieu Derrit, Antoine MAGNIN and Traazior. It came out on 20-02-2023.
Forgotten World (itch) (Mathieu Derrit, Antoine MAGNIN, Traazior) is available on PC. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
